```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Load necessary libraries
library(leaflet)

# Create a Leaflet map
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(
    lng = -73.985130,
    lat = 40.748817,
    popup = "New York City"
  )
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
